title: Playground, Sparkling Pools, Patios, Updated Appliances
posting_body: ['Fun in the sun!', 'Timber Lodge Apartments For Rent In Thornton, CO.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Timber Lodge', '1769 Coronado Parkway N, Thornton, CO, 80229', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath', 'Timber Lodge Apartments is professionally managed and maintained by a friendly staff who set the standard for an exceptional customer experience.', 'Residents enjoy access to community features that include a playground, a soccer field and a fitness center with cardio and strength training equipment as well as lounging by our sparkling pool.', 'When the almost-always sunny Colorado weather permits, friends gather under shade of a gazebo or next to one of our BBQ Grills.', 'Our Community Clubhouse, business center and lounge for the convenience and entertainment of our residents.', 'Features', '- Dishwasher*', '- Ceiling Fan*', '- Balconies & Patios*', '- Microwave*', '- Air Conditioner', '- Walk in Closets*', '- Carpet', '- Cable Ready', '- Remodeled*', '*In Select Units', 'Community Amenities', '- Online Payment', '- Courtesy Patrol', '- Pet Park', '- 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- Accepts Electronic Payment', '- Professional Management', '- Fun Resident Events Sponsored by Management', '- In Building Laundry Facilities (24 Hours)', '- Playground', '- Fitness Center', '- Media Center', '- Soccer Field', '- Sparkling Pools', '- Picnic Area & BBQ Grills', '- Carports', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly', 'Up to 2 pets per household.', 'Some breed restrictions apply, contact us for details.', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 gross income times the rent amount', 'Driving Directions', 'Take I-25 to 84th Ave, Head East, Turn South on Washington St, Head East on Coronado Parkway North, located on the right hand side.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:8:30AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'LxEU7oGM1Lzj']
